name: Escape the Island (itch) (LuisGCIII)
description:
This game follows a young little boy who lives on a Island that is filled with nothing but trash that spreads germs and bacteria around, killing or making people ill, and killing the crops on the Island, shortening the food supply for everybody.

The purpose behind this game is to mention the issue were Japan plans on discharging more than 1,000 tanks of nuclear wastewater into the pacific. I wanted come up with a story inspired by this situation in the hopes of making the game and its story feel realistic for the player. This is a narrative heavy game so the player can feel immerse and believe they are apart of this world and they are witnessing what is going on in the point of view of a kid.
